definition: expressible as a quantity or relating to or susceptible of measurement
details:
adjective
- expressible as a quantity or relating to or susceptible of measurement
= example: expressible as a quantity or relating to or susceptible of measurement
- of verse, having a metric system based on relative duration of syllables
= example: of verse, having a metric system based on relative duration of syllables
- relating to the measurement of quantity
= example: relating to the measurement of quantity
